features: ULTIMATE HYDRATION: Our Day Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide provides deep and lasting hydration to quench dry skin, leaving it plump and supple. Experience the moisturizing power of these potent ingredients for a radiant complexion.

BRIGHTER SKIN: Infused with Niacinamide, our day cream helps reduce the appearance of dark spots and uneven skin tone, revealing a brighter and more luminous complexion. Say goodbye to dullness and hello to a revitalized glow.

KEY INGREDIENTS: Hyaluronic Acid deeply hydrates and locks in moisture, providing a plumping effect for smooth and supple skin. Niacinamide helps improve skin texture, brightens the complexion, and reduces the appearance of pores.

MADE IN SOUTH KOREA: Embrace the excellence of South Korean skincare with our day cream. Crafted in South Korea, known for its cutting-edge beauty innovations, our product offers you the quality and effectiveness of a Korean-made moisturizer.

EASY TO USE: Our day cream is designed for effortless application. After cleansing and toning, apply a small amount to your face and neck in the morning. Its lightweight and fast-absorbing formula make it perfect for daily use.

MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: If you have any challenges using Repair Beauty Day Cream, reach out anytime for help from our skincare experts. We'll respond ASAP! If you're not totally satisfied, we will refund you in full.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1 Gently apply with fingertips after face wash. Avoid the eye area and lips. Step 2 Relax and let the face cream dry for a few minutes. Enjoy fresh, radiant skin. Step 3 Continue with the beauty regime with hydrated and nourished skin.

Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide Face Cream Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin E Face Masks Mint & Tea Tree Foot Masks Vitamin C, Collagen & Peptides Eye Cream Intended for Face Face Feet Eye Area Skin-Friendly ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Moisturizing ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Vegan ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Infused with Natural Ingredients ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty-Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Even Under Makeup!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn’t find the product I’d been using for 40 years anymore so I tried this and it is better and amazing. I put it on after my shower and put makeup over it and it’s wonderful and inexpensive. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: A little goes a long way with this moisturizer. Just a light dab really does the trick. I spend a lot of time in the sun so my face soaks this up. The added vitamin repair is worth it alone. I struggled with dry skin always pealing on my nose. This helped fix the issue and hydrated my skin a lot. This is much more preferable to use after being exposed to the sun all day compared to aloe. This is a silky cream that is fast absorbing with a clean non oily feeling. Even though it’s listed as unscented it does have a lovely light floral scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super moisturizing. Keep my dry skin moist for 24 hours.
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff. It's thick and it smells wonderful. Colorado causes really dry skin and this kept my face thirst free for 24 hours. You don't need a lot to get the job done. It did not make my skin feel greasy. It comes with a good amount for the price. It holds up against my expensive Aveda skin care routine. This is a must have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: You get a lot of product for the price. Smells reallyNice. It’s not sticky or heavy and hydrates my skin really well! I enjoy adding it to my skin care routine! Great find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was a little skeptical on trying a skincare product but its very smooth, hydrating and it smells good but its subtle. leaves my skin feeling very soft. my skin hasn't felt greasy and I haven't had any big breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a good size jar of moisturizer it doesn’t feel too heavy upon use than adding into my regular skin care routine hasn’t added any irritation or any skin issues whatsoever my skin feels soft and moisturized and it’s very mildly smelling if any scent at all. No complaints it does what it says it supposed to and my skin feels good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I was hoping for
reviews.reviewText: I have migraines and I'm very smell sensitive. This scent was not for me. I had to wash my and get the smell off.That doesn't mean it isn't a good product, it just didn't smell good to me.The company does have a lot of wasted packaging, IMHO. It was about twice the size of the container. I hope they can fix that since they aren't fooling anyone that the container is bigger than the packaging based on the weight of the product.I hope you enjoy the product
